1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.Utility
4  ( -- * Trim
5    trimLeft, trimRight, trimBoth,
6    -- * Padding
7    padRight, padRightWith,
8    padLeft, padLeftWith,
9    stringWidth,
10    -- * Put
11    putShow, putShowLn,
12    putLines, hPutLines, hPutEmptyLine,
13    -- * Read
14    readInt, readInteger,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Data.Char                     as Ch
18import qualified System.IO                     as IO
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude  as B
20
21
22-- ----------------------  Trim
23
24isSpace :: Char -> Bool
25isSpace c = Ch.isSpace c    -- UnicodeSeprator | UnicodeOther
26
27trimLeft :: B.Map String
28trimLeft = dropWhile isSpace
29
30trimRight :: B.Map String
31trimRight [] = []
32trimRight (x : xs) =
33    case x : trimRight xs of
34      [y] | isSpace y -> []
35      ys -> ys
36
37trimBoth :: B.Map String
38trimBoth = trimRight . trimLeft
39
40
41-- ----------------------  Padding
42
43-- | Add spaces to right.
44--
45--   >>> padRight 10 "abc"
46--   "abc       "
47padRight :: Int -> B.Map String
48padRight = padRightWith ' '
49
50padRightWith :: Char -> Int -> B.Map String
51padRightWith p n s = s ++ replicate rest p where
52    rest = max 0 (n - stringWidth s)
53
54-- | Add spaces to left.
55--
56--   >>> padLeft 10 "abc"
57--   "       abc"
58padLeft :: Int -> B.Map String
59padLeft = padLeftWith ' '
60
61padLeftWith :: Char -> Int -> B.Map String
62padLeftWith p n s = replicate rest p ++ s where
63    rest = max 0 (n - stringWidth s)
64
65stringWidth :: String -> Int
66stringWidth = sum . map charWidth
67
68charWidth :: Char -> Int
69charWidth c
70    | Ch.ord c >= 256  = 2
71    | otherwise        = 1
72
73
74-- ----------------------  Put
75
76putShow :: (Show a) => a -> IO ()
77putShow = putStr . show
78
79putShowLn :: (Show a) => a -> IO ()
80putShowLn = putStrLn . show
81
82putLines :: [String] -> IO ()
83putLines = putStr . unlines
84
85hPutLines :: IO.Handle -> [String] -> IO ()
86hPutLines h = (IO.hPutStrLn h `mapM_`)
87
88hPutEmptyLine :: IO.Handle -> IO ()
89hPutEmptyLine h = IO.hPutStrLn h ""
90
91
92-- ----------------------  Read
93
94readJust :: (Read a) => String -> Maybe a
95readJust s = case reads s of
96              [(x, "")] -> Just x
97              _         -> Nothing
98
99readInt :: String -> Maybe Int
100readInt = readJust
101
102readInteger :: String -> Maybe Integer
103readInteger = readJust
104
